name: Chocolate Soleil Melting Bronzing & Sculpting Stick
about: What it is: A creamy, buildable, and blendable stick bronzer that provides natural-looking warmth and dimension...Highlighted Ingredients: - Vitamin E.- Squalane..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and mineral oil. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This easy cream bronzer and sculpting stick gives you natural-looking, second-skin warmth and dimension that smells as good as it looks! The formula is lightweight and blendable; it won't disturb makeup, gives a natural finish, and is made with skin-loving ingredients.
ingredients: -Vitamin E .-Squalane ..WaterAquaEau, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Synthetic Wax, Mica, Silica, Dimethicone, Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Sorbitan Olivate, Boron Nitride, Dipentaerythrityl Hexa C5-9 Acid Esters, Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylyl Glycol, Methicone, Squalane, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Fruit Powder, Butylene Glycol, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Propylene Carbonate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Oleic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Sodium Chloride, Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Myristic Acid, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Fragrance (Parfum), Limonene, Benzyl Benzoate, Tocopheryl Acetate,  [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499)...Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After applying foundation, swipe stick over areas of the face you wish to bronze..-Focus on areas where the sun would naturally hit: cheeks, nose, forehead, chin, and hollows of cheeks..-Using fingers, brush, or a sponge, tap or buff into skin until desired look is achieved..-Recap bronzer to keep it soft and creamy.

reviews.review_title: Too melty (applies beautifully but not packaging)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, if you are sensitive or do not like fragrance in your products, avoid this bronzer stick at all cost. I was only opening the box that held the stick and could potently smell the sweet chocolate scent and I don’t have a problem with fragrance so I loved it! When you open the stick and also even as you apply it to your face and or  get a bronzing brush and dab it from the stick itself - you can definitely get that whiff of chocolate smell.  The product was easy to use and it’s really smooth and was an easy application directly on my face BUT a little goes a long way. I try to make slight lines or like one dot (similar to rare beauty) and slowly add more if needed because it can be very pigmented like a blush. The only downside is that because it applies smoothly, the bronzer itself is not sturdy. I know the stick is called melting bronzer & sculpting stick but it is very flimsy and melty when you roll it up and when I would use my brush to get the product through that method and apply it on my face. Like it breaks and so i try to do it lightly everytime so that the whole bronzer doesn’t come crashing down. Overall, I really like it but while it’s a melty chocolate goodness, it could use some sturdiness so that it doesn’t easily crumble (see pictures). I don’t and didn’t even press hard either when I first used and opened it so I’m not even sure how. I know it’s in the name that it’s a soufle and mousse + melting which is probaby why it’s soft but it could use a little firmness.

It fits my matches perfectly and it gives u lot of time to work with it, it doesn’t crack when dealing with the powder it looks natural I just love it !💕💕

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It has a nice finish. Blends out nicely. Only need a little bit. I think it would look even better if I had a tan. Convenient packaging too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never used a bronzing stick before but this did not disappoint! It blended beautifully and the color was great for my very fair skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, this bronzing stick smells soooo good I can almost taste it. It applies very smoothly to the skin and melts in seconds. I love the brown chocolate pigment and packaging. I should’ve gotten the darkest shade, but this shade will do for now. 9/10.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this! I’m a long time user and lover on too faced products. This bronzer blended beautifully and stayed on all day long. I highly recommend to anyone looking for a new bronzer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the convenience of this product! How it is in a cream stick, makes it so easy to apply. The texture of it going on is so smooth and that makes it blend really well! The color is perfect for medium/fair skin especially in the summer with a tan! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great! I just wish it came in a slightly lighter color for fair skinned people. The packaging is excellent. The blendability and texture is perfect, almost like butter. Will be perfect for summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Too Faced Melting Bronzing Sculpting Stick in the shade Chocolate Mousse is a dream for anyone craving a warm, sun-kissed glow. Its rich, chocolatey hue adds depth and dimension to the skin, effortlessly sculpting and contouring with a natural finish. The creamy formula glides on smoothly, blending like a dream for a flawless application every time, ensuring a smooth and even finish without any harsh lines or patches. Whether you're going for a subtle contour or a more dramatic bronze, this stick delivers stunning results with ease.   Additionally, the stick format makes it incredibly convenient to use, especially for on-the-go touch-ups or travel. Its compact size and mess-free application make it a practical choice for busy lifestyles. It's a must-have addition to any makeup routine for that coveted luminous complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The stick makes it super easy to place the bronzer, and the formula makes it super easy to blend. It’s on the warmer side, so definitely a bronzer and not a contour stick. It smells just like chocolate. It can get patchy if you apply too much, so make sure you build slowly. Overall a good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my honest review. So I really, really, like this bronzer. It is so creamy, easy to apply and super easy to blend. It gives a beautiful finishing look. Also this literally smells just like chocolate l. It smells so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my honest review. I honestly love this product! Went on smoothly and added just the right amount of color to my skin. Very creamy and easily blended. Smells like chocolate just like their other products! Would definitely recommend! Works well for simple glam and full face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It’s a 10 out of 10. It smells great it blends so good. Perfect for my skin. I will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this sculpting stick! It has an easy application and is very smooth. It blends so well and is buildable. I would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer may become a new favorite in my full-face makeup routine. I have dry olive skin and this provided such a beautiful warmth to my face. I do feel that if your skin is extremely dry it may catch onto any dry patches you may have. The scent is nice and isn't overwhelming and didn't cause any bad reaction for me. This bronzer blended quite easily and is pretty pigmented so a little goes a long way. The packaging is nice and sleek and isn't messy. Overall I feel this is an excellent stick bronzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A solid bronzer, it's not muddy and glides on pretty easily. It's a little warm, but it's a bronzer after all. Good packaging. I like the stick form, easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster and Too Faced in exchange for my honest review. I really love this bronzer. The formula melts into your skin or foundation and blends super well without losing pigmentation. It’s very buttery when blending, but settles well. It also smells really good, like a powdery chocolate scent that’s not super intense. I really love the packaging, the brown/gold twist feels heavy and looks luxurious. I only took one point off because the lightest shade still has a bit of an orange tone on me- but I am also not tan at all right now so that could affect it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing it’s definitely the creamiest pigment bronzer I’ve ever used and the biggest plus is it smells amazing exactly like chocolate❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This makes for a super easy and effortless bronzing application! The color was perfect and its very buildable. Its so easy to use and does not go on very pigmented so you dont have to do a ton of blending.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this bronzing stick! It melts like butter and blends incredibly well. I usually only use powder bronzers and tend to stay away from the cream type. The creams types are usually too hard for me to blend and even harder for me to make look natural. Not with this though. I feel like a pro applying this.

reviews.review_title: Good Color, But Too Much Chocolate Smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got this contour stick and their were great results for color and application. It blended easily and gave a natural contour. However, I was not a fan of the scent—it smelled like chocolate all day. If you enjoy that, it's a bonus, but I found it too much. If you prefer a more neutral-smelling product, you might want to look elsewhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product, the size is great for a toiletry bag, the pigmentation is great, extremely creamy, it blends very well into the skin, you can build up layers to leave it in your desired tone, the color I chose is great for contouring due to coloring of my skin, I would use a warmer tone to give the sensation of bronzer in some areas, so I will definitely buy another shade of this product soon. Its formula is incredible, with squalane and vitamin E in its composition, which is incredible for our skin, the smell is delicious, I was tempted to take a few bites but I restrained myself lol It's a considerably cheap product in relation to the amount of product and how much it yields, I think that if you analyze these factors, it is a product at a very good price. It is also not tested on animals.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free in exchange for my opinion. Although the color was a little darker than I prefer, I loved this contour stick! It blends out so easy and leaves a nice finish (not cakey). The box and tube it comes in are chic and very aesthetically pleasing. I am going to purchase this in the shade that matches my skin tone better and will definitely be recommending it to my makeup loving friends & family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this products. Smells like hot cocoa, goes on so smooth, and blends out perfectly! I use this on my cheek bones, the sides of my nose, and on my jawline. Blends so well that you don’t have to worry about weird lines.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found my new bronzing stick! I’ve use the powder version and loved it. This stick is an elevated version of it. The stick is so smooth and buildable. It’s gives the perfect warmth to your face. It also have the amazing chocolate scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its very easy to blend with a brush and the texture is very creamy. Its mat finish. I usually go for the glowy finish when it comes to bronzer, foundation, etc. its good if you are going out at night

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a beautiful contour color and really melts into the skin. I’m not a big fan of the applicator, but the product is really great and i love the too face chocolate line (smells amazing chocolate 🍫!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s too faced so you already know it smells like chocolate! It is super pigmented and easily blended! I personally love it! Given complimentary to me by Influenster

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Blends beautifully. Love that it smells like the powder version. Great alternative to the powder bronzer that i currently use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very creamy bronzing stick, which I love. But you really need to prep and prime your skin well for it took blend out in my opinion but I have very dry skin. The first time I tried it I did not achieve the results I wanted because of my base but the second time was flawless!! If you have dry skin make sure to prep prep prep. Moisturize that skin ladies and gents. I live in AZ so my skin is very dry. This formula is very creamy and it’s very blendable. Use a lot for that glam look or little for that face lift look. You do don’t need much product either way! This stick will last you.   4/5 just because I wish it had a tad bit more hydrating products but hey that’s what toner, essence, moisturizer and serum is for!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved trying this bronzer. I loved the smell!! and the texture is very creamy and easy to blend. I love how hydrated my skin looks with this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this! I honestly was a more liquid bronzer myself But this thing smells good it’s builds great and it looks natural to the skin you do have to work it fast on it because it does dry a little fast

reviews.review_title: Very blendable and creamy, not my favorite shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been trying this bronzer and sculpting stick from Too Faced for a few weeks now, so I have a good idea of how I feel about it. Packaging is beautiful, chocolate color component with a magnetic closure. Texture really is smooth and buttery, agreeing with its name - Melting Bronzer & Sculpting Stick. It blends out effortlessly! But if you blend too much, the color kind of disappears. But it’s easily buildable. The color I received (Chocolate Mousse) is definitely more of a contour shade vs bronzing shade and mimics my natural shadows (light/ medium neutral skin tone). However, it’s a little TOO cool toned for my liking, too gray. Which is just a personal preference! I’m in more of a bronzy era than a super contoured look. I do love using it on the sides of my nose to create a snatched look. I’d be interested in checking out the other shades. Overall, I’d recommend this if you’re into cream products (looks like we all are lately!) and want an easy/ non stressful step in your makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s advertised to smell like chocolate covered oranges and it really does! Scent goes away and is not super strong and was fine for me (I’m sensitive to fragrance). The shade was good for my light-medium skin. It is very easy to use and blends very easily!!! So easy to use! It is sheer and easy to build up for a stronger look. The undertone is neutral so I really can use it as a brontour

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. Overall, I feel like this is a decent bronzer. The scent is pleasant and not overbearing and the product is buildable and easy to blend. I have very fair skin, so a little went a long for me in terms of color payout. Personally, the texture is a bit more creamy than I typically like but other than that I think this is a decent bronzing stick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Too Faced Chocolate Soleil Melting Bronzing & Sculpting stick is a smooth, easy to apply product. It glides on easily and is not at all chalky. Texture is something I immediately look for in a stick face makeup product, so I’m pleased with the easy to use, satiny texture. The chocolate caramel shade gives the perfect amount of warmth to my base. It’s very natural looking. While the product applies easily and is a nice shade, the scent threw me off. It smells like a tootsie roll. I’m a sensitive skin, acne prone girlie. So, I’m very particular about what I put on my skin. Because this bronzing & sculpting stick smells like artificial candy I don’t know if I’ll keep this product in my daily makeup routine. However, having tested it a couple of wears, I didn’t notice any immediate breakouts or skin concerns. This stick wears/blends really well and plays nicely with my other makeup products. But the scent is keeping me at 3 stars for this bronzing & contouring stick. It’s great if you’re not concerned with sensitive skin issues.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product!! This product has the signature too faced chocolate smell so I felt super nostalgic using this product. I personally love the smell, but I can see how it can be divisive. If you can look past the smell, I recommend this product because it’s m so creamy and blends like a dream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received these products for free from Influenster and brand(s) in exchange for my honest review.   This cream bronzer stick is in metal, lightweight packaging so it stays nice and cool and won’t weigh down your bag.  The product itself I found to perform quite nicely.  The shade I received, Chocolate Mousse, had a nice, slight glow to it and wasn’t too orange or too warm-toned for me, especially as I am quite pale.  The formula was smooth and soft so it blended easily and evenly.  I found that this bronzer brought back a natural color to my face and made it look very naturally pretty.  This formula seems able to sheer/blend out but I’m sure you could build it up to be a bit more noticeable if you wanted, so you might even be able to use this product as a simple all-over cream eyeshadow.  The product accurately and pleasantly smells like chocolate covered oranges and I find the $35 price tag to be fair for what it is.  I will definitely be using this again in the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this 2-in-1 product. It glides so creamy and blends very easily. I'm a novice at cream contour and bronzing products but this one is user-friendly. I have dry/combination skin and this works for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzing stick actually melts on the skin. The coverage is definitely full and it’s smells like actual chocolate.

reviews.review_title: 6/10 only bc I don't like the smell
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super creamyy, a little goes a long way. It kinda smells like chocolate, its not my favorite but if you like that then you’ll like this. It goes on smooth, not patchy on me.

reviews.review_title: Blends seamlessly for a naturally sun kissed look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Disclaimer: I received this product free from Influenster for testing purposes but the opinions expressed remain 100% my own honest thoughts. I am so excited that I was able to review the Too Faced Melting Bronzing & Sculpting Stick in the shade chocolate souffle. It is my first time using a stick bronzer I usually prefer to use powder bronzers because my makeup is often very light no makeup looks.  The texture of this product is so buttery smooth and blends seamlessly making you look more bronzed and naturally sun kissed without being too obvious or heavy. The color chocolate souffle is perfect for my medium skintone without leaning orange or too ashy its the perfect warm bronzer. If you haven't tried too faced Bronzing sticks you are missing out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: amazing product glides onto the skin and blends effortlessly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my unbiased opinion. I am a big fan of this bronzing stick. It blends great and it is clean. It is a great color. I just love the look this product creates.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a month I fell in love with it the formula is so creamy it had my cheeks and nose looking so snatched a little goes a long way blending it is so incredibly easy the smell is so good I just what to eat it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don’t like the smell of makeup but this actually smells like chocolate! The packaging is pretty. The product glides on like butter. Blends easily. You don’t need a lot as it has good pigment. It gave me a nice glow which I love for my makeup. If you love a natural look, I highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using bronzer specially when the weather is warmer; this one was the perfect shade but it took me a couple of uses to blend it correctly, it was not as easy to me as some of other reviews said. The texture and pigment were good, the bronzer last all day and look really natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall as a brand I love too faced anyway and this product was no disappointment! I like the stick product, because I can make sharp lines exactly where I want them, like the sides of my nose. I love that this company is cruelty free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzing stick is smooth. It’s contoured my face well without leaving harsh lines. The formula is really smooth and creamy. It’s super easy to blend in with makeup would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzing stick is rich in color. It’s easy to apply with a brush or right out of the tub. It glides on smoothly and the formula creamy. It smells like chocolate 😍

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing! Blends like a dream a+++ would buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this product. It’s really creamy with a natural finish. It also blends easily and is buildable. I love the shade as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells just like chocolate mousse. It is also very defendable and blends. Well the packaging is chic and perfect to fit into a travel bag. I would highly suggest this product, especially if you are a beginner like me since it’s easy to apply and blend out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do really like how this blends for cheek, forehead, jaw contour, but a little too muddy for the nose. Blends out great, smells strong, but yummy. Unsure if it’s aggravating my skin or not just yet…i do reach for it often though!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A really versatile bronzer! The cream formula is still pretty light and it’s easy to blend so I don’t have to worry about over applying. A brush makes this super easy to blend. I’ll set it with a powdered bronzer on top.   It does smell pretty heavily of chocolate— I know this is fairly consistent across Too Faced products but it’s a strong scent which may not be universally liked.   I received a sample in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this new bronzing stick !!! Is super creamy and easy to blend ! It also smells like a chocolate bar 🥰

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this contour. The color, the creamy texture,  blends so smoothly and wears so well. Not to mention smells like chocolate.  Too Faced redeemed itself with this one. I just hope they don't take it away like they usually do with the products of theirs I love... ahem peach perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product is creamy but the smell is awful. I really wanted to like this but it’s just not for me. I feel like when I blend out the product it almost disappears.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product with my own money, I did not receive it free for review. This is one of the best bronzing/contour products I have ever used. So creamy, hydrating & blends out effortlessly. I wear it on my bare skin to add a little color to my face & I wear it on top of other products without any issues. It works both ways. I bought extras so I never go without.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this!!!! It’s my new go to got contour stick! The smell is amazing and the color is brilliant! I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was so easy to use! It glides easily on my skin and blends flawlessly to sculpt my face! It feels super smooth and doesn’t get cakey. Easy to draw on my face for the areas I want to bronze!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too Faced melting bronzing stick is so creamy and blendable! I highly recommend for anyone looking for a natural looking bronzer that layers well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time using a bronzing and sculpting stick so I was pretty timid. The color felt too dark just by looking at it in the tube. I watched the video that shows how to lightly outline your cheek, forehead and nose bones then blend. It looked easy enough. It went on smooth as butter! I was so surprised how smooth it was. Then it blended even easier. Like swoosh swoosh and I looked like a bronze goddess in the best way. I absolutely LOVE this color. It goes on dark but when blended turns a beautiful light bronze / pinkish hue. I can not say enough great things about this sculpting stick! It’s so easy to use and lasts all day without smudging. Every time I use it I feel beautiful!  So much better than regular blush or bronzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a pretty color! Very creamy and glides on the skin beautifully. The packaging is sleek too!

reviews.review_title: one of the best products around!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: one of the absolute greatest bronzing/contour products! it's sooo creamy, blends like a dream. I use it almost daily and I've yet to encounter any issues. it also smells great. I'd love for them to expand the range or add blush sticks with this exact formula

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this bronzer stick! This is the creamiest bronzer stick I’ve ever tried, it applies so smoothly and blends really easily. The shade Chocolate Soufflé works great for my skin tone. I also LOVE the scent, it smells like chocolate covered oranges! This product will definitely be a new staple in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product free from Influenster and Too Faced in exchange for my honest review.  This stick is so creamy and smooth, and super easy to apply in just the right areas. It's really easy to blend out- I personally prefer using a brush to the best blend. I like that I can use it for more than just contouring my face, I can also apply a little with my foundation to give my face a nice sun-kissed bronze. It even smells like chocolate! Love this product so much!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this bronzing stick!! Is so easy to blend, the formula is so soft and smells delicious! Super recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, the packaging is gorgeous!  This blends so great! The color is perfect. My daughter and I are a a few shades apart and this worked great for both of us.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product i noticed it gives a really beautiful warmth to the face, even after comparing it to some of my favorite cream bronzers it’s up there in quality. I love that the product packs a big punch in pigment but don't be intimidated it’s very easy to blend. The only reas on why im not giving it 5 starts is because i would love to see a more inclusive shade range but i would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a solid cream bronzer stick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product that goes on smoothly and creamy. It builds and blends nice while still looking natural and glowy. It lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the Chocolate Caramel, which turned out to be the perfect shade as you can see from the pictures. It also easily blended in with good coverage and smells so good. I also noticed that it's very light and isn't heavy. I highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The scent of this product is mouthwatering for all chocolate lovers out there! I was excited to receive this product free for testing purposes from this reputable brand! The packaging is cute and simple, very elegant. my skin is a bit pale from the winter months so I was worried about the pigmentation of this bronzer. However., blend and texture are easy to work with even for a beginner. The most impressive feature was the long lasting contour that made my face look flawless all day. The price is higher, but you do get what you pay for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a great bronzer! So easy to apply and blends like a dream! I have combo skin and was a bit concerned about causing pimples on my oily areas or setting into lines on my very dry areas but I haven't had any issues at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new go to contour stick. It blends very seamlessly and apply great too. It does start to get very soft against skin since it begins to melt so just be careful of that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Urban Decay Bronzer Stick is a versatile and user-friendly product that provides a natural-looking sun-kissed glow. Its creamy formula blends seamlessly into the skin, allowing for easy application and precise contouring. The buildable coverage allows for customizable intensity, while its long-lasting formula ensures that your bronzed look stays put throughout the day. Convenient for on-the-go touch-ups, this bronzer stick is a must-have for anyone looking to add warmth and definition to their complexion effortlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is incredibly soft. Part of it broke off inside of the tube which is strange. It’s easy to use and blend. It looks too dark at first, but blends out really nicely. It’s definitely a bronzer, not really for sculpting.   It smells like chocolate, but you don’t smell it at all when it’s on your face. It’s easy to use and the packaging is sturdy. I could see it blending away if you blend a little too much though. Great for if you’re new to bronzing.   I did receive this product in exchange for a review from influencer, but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this Too Faced Chocolate Soleil Melting Bronzing and Sculpting Stick in exchange for my honest opinion. The first thing I noticed was the packaging, which is both cute and practical. The gold labeling makes it feel expensive, and the size fits perfectly in my makeup bag for on-the-go use. The product itself has a creamy texture that glides smoothly onto the skin without tugging. It blends effortlessly, which is great for both beginners and those more experienced with contouring and bronzing.  The color payoff is also impressive; it gives a natural, sun-kissed look that isn't too orange or muddy. The matte finish looks natural on the skin, and I appreciate that it doesn’t have any shimmer for those days when I want a more subtle contour. Another feature I noticed is its scent — it has a pleasant chocolate smell, which makes the application experience more enjoyable, though I could understand if some people were a bit put off by it.  In terms of longevity, the color holds up pretty well throughout the day without becoming patchy or fading too much, although in very hot or humid weather, a setting spray might be needed for extra staying power.  Overall, I would say this is a solid bronzing stick. It's user-friendly, versatile for various skin tones (though the lightest shade happened to be a tad too pale for me!), and adds a lovely dimension to my makeup routine. If you're looking for a new bronzer to try, this one is definitely worth considering.

reviews.review_text: Absolutely love two faced products, and this one is no different! Great buttery texture that melts into skin and blends easily. It isn't oily and doesn't break me out. If you use setting spray on top, it doesn't budge! Great color and blendability.

reviews.review_text: After using this product for several weeks, I think this is expensive for what it is. This product has an okay shade range, and is really creamy and easy to blend in with a brush. I feel it's a little difficult to blend with a sponge. Maybe it's the oils in the product disagreeing with the damp sponge, but it looks patchy when using a damp sponge. I would highly recommend a stippling brush or dense brush to blend this out. I found the scent a little strong, so if you are sensitive to scents be weary. It does go away quickly, but it is something to be aware of. Also, the price is 35 dollars for 8g of product. I compared it to another stick bronzer I own that has 10g for 16 dollars. Even though they are different brands and formulas, I find Too Faced does offer a more luxurious experience. I do think it does run very warm, and even though bronzer is supposed to add warmth, I do think this line would benefit for a more neutral undertone options and deeper shades as well. While I like this product and will use it until I finish it, I can't say I would spend almost 40 dollars on a product like this.

I have dry skin so this stick is perfect for me as it gives a natural glow without being powdery or flaky. It’s cruelty free! It’s lightweight and hydrating.

reviews.review_text: I know a lot of people have talked about the smell online, but that's not the best part of this bronzing stick. The formula glides on seamlessly, feels cool when applied, blends out effortlessly, and stays. I can build it up, sheer it out.. whatever I want. I NEVER write reviews, but for this, I had to. I searched for a great bronzer for years. I've tried just about all the big brands: Rare Beauty, NARS, Sephora, Tillbury, Mario, Pixi, Sheglam, Milk, Nyx, Elf, Nudestix, Tower, Physicians Formula, you name it, I bought it. None of them compared to this stick. It is SOOO EASY to blend, which is tough on Medium/Full Coverage foundations without moving your foundation. Once it's blended, set it. IT DOES NOT MOVE! I work 10-12 hrs a day most days. By the end of the day, my blush faded, eyeliner smeared, lip is gone, but that bronzer is right where I put it. I'm probably going to buy 5 more just so I have them. I typically don't buy a first drop of a product until I see reviews & videos from others. I took a chance on this one, and I'm SO GLAD I did! Works great on my nose contour, jawline... LOVE, LOVE, LOVE IT!!!! Buy it! But leave one for me!!

reviews.review_title: A cream version of my favorite bronzer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m loving this Too Faced bronzer stick! Too Faced Cocolate Soleil has been my go-to bronzer for over 10 years, so I was thrilled to get the opportunity to try their cream stick formulation. I have the shade Chocolate Soufflé, which works for my light-medium warm toned skin in the summer. In the winter, I’d have to use the Chocolate Mousse shade. This product is pigmented, so a little goes a long way. You can make light dots or marks on your face where you want to put product; you don’t have to draw the product on using big, thick lines. I found this to blend very well on my skin and sit better with my other products than other cream bronzer sticks I’ve tried in the past. I don’t love the scent, though; it reminds me of the scent of a Tootsie Roll. I see the product description says the product smells like chocolate covered oranges, which aren’t my favorite to begin with, so I may be biased scent-wise in a way you aren’t. I prefer the scent of the Chocolate Soleil powder bronzer but assume the citrusy scent addition in this product is related to an ingredient(s) or formulation. Regardless, I’ll be continuing to use this!
